data.text: @willem_acker Well thanks anyway. Actually, i saw a post earlier today that suggested a few adverse reactions from Novavax similar to those from mRNA 💉 happening, which i thought interesting given the hype around it being more "traditional". Time will tell - and probably not too much time
@willem_acker I’d say you could times that number but 10 as most aren’t getting reported anyway

@willem_acker This is a messed up world..................
https://t.co/exwNETANzP

@PWBBOOMER No credit due; I was only wondering how well Novavax was doing.

And then somebody shouted out “but all medicines cause injuries you drongo”…

So I tested that idea… 

Thought it was interesting and shared…
@willem_acker Its good to see these numbers so clearly. Thanks for taking the time to look them up and publish them
@PWBBOOMER Ohh yes correct - it’s very easy to miss such small details…

@willem_acker Then do how LONG it took to get the Polio vaccine 'right' and how many issues they had over how many years.

People are idiots.
@willem_acker With such minor differences its no wonder the MSM haven't picked it up
